summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Community Development Block Grant Float Loan Program; authorizing a short-term loan of up to One Million Dollars ($1,000,000) in Block Grant funds to Seattle Chinatown International District Preservation and Development Authority (SCIDPDA) for an economic development project involving the development of the International District Village Square which will house social service agencies and provide 75 units of housing for the frail elderly; and authorizing an amendment to the City of Seattle's 1996 Consolidated Plan.
